headline: CoStar Tweaks Severance Plan As Activists Press For Governance Shifts
summary: CoStar Group (NasdaqGS:CSGP) has amended its Executive Severance Plan, removing a contested clause tied to change of control and leadership transitions. The change follows legal challenges connected to an ongoing proxy contest and pressure from activist investors Third Point LLC and D. E. Shaw & Co. The move is intended to reduce governance friction, address shareholder concerns and keep management focused on running the business. CoStar Group, a provider of commercial real estate...
